body: A fourth base form, aquatic, is available to eidolons in addition to the biped, quadruped, and serpentine base forms. The aquatic base form follows all of the normal rules for base forms and can select the mount evolution.
name: Aquatic Base Form
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Aquatic Base Form

sections.name: Aquatic
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Aquatic Base Form/Aquatic

sections.body: Size Medium; Speed 20 ft., swim 40 ft.; AC +4 natural armor; Saves Fort (good), Ref (good), Will (bad); Attack bite (1d6); Ability Scores Str 16, Dex 12, Con 13, Int 7, Wis 10, Cha 11; Free Evolutions bite, improved natural armor, gills, swim (2).
sections.name: Starting Statistics
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Aquatic Base Form/Aquatic/Starting Statistics
